projectdescription: A website to guard against viruses, real ones, not the computer kind.

securityreviews.review: The site will protect you from the common cold, i haven't been sick since!

projectdescription: A website to guard against tigers.

securityreviews.review: The site will protect you from the tigers, i haven't seen a single tiger since!

projectdescription: A website to guard against cancers, as in the astrological sign, not the disease.

securityreviews.review: My ex was a cancer with a double capricorn moon rising in his eastern house so.... this software was obvi a lifesaver!

projecttitle: Anti-Anyone I Knew In Highschool Software
projectdescription: A website to guard against those awkward interactions where you bump into a friend from high school and they are all like omg how have you been and you would rather run but social norms dictate you have to let this person interupt your day and remind you how much time has passed and how little you have acomplished.

securityreviews.review: The single most important technology of our era!
